sentences.en: Blasphemy. You tell me there are no eggs and you blame your Maker for it.
sentences.cn: 该死, 你自己说没鸡蛋――你倒怪罪上帝!

sentences.en: For her, wearing make up at home is tantamount to blasphemy.
sentences.cn: 对于她来说, 在家还要化妆简直天理难容.
他犯了对宗教的亵渎罪.

sentences.en: He has acted out every kind of blasphemy, including dressing up as the pope in Rome.
sentences.cn: 他做过各种亵渎行为，包括在罗马装扮成教皇。

sentences.en: He was found guilty of blasphemy and sentenced to three years in jail.
sentences.cn: 他被判犯有亵渎神明罪，刑期3年。

sentences.en: He was well punished for his blasphemy against learning.
sentences.cn: 他因亵渎学问受到了应有的惩罚.

sentences.en: Is the work of the model - making - its - own - model a sacrament or a blasphemy?
sentences.cn: 模型建立自己的模型的工作,到底是虔诚还是亵渎?

sentences.en: It felt like blasphemy. Or at the very least, horribly irreverent.
sentences.cn: 感觉起来像是亵渎. 或至少是可怕的不敬.

sentences.en: Murder and blasphemy are mortal sins.
sentences.cn: 谋杀和亵渎神明的言词都是不可饶恕的大罪.

sentences.en: PLAYER . Blasphemy . Anguish comes soon. Disgust . Magic sorrows.
sentences.cn: 你亵渎我, 苦闷即将降临你身,我厌恶,我悲伤.

sentences.en: Show me how to punish Perseus for this blasphemy!
sentences.cn: 告诉我怎么才能惩罚珀修斯因为他的亵渎!

sentences.en: Such actions are are type of blasphemy.
sentences.cn: 这样的行为是一种亵渎.

sentences.en: The MP described the killings as a blasphemy before God.
sentences.cn: 这位下院议员称这些谋杀是在上帝面前的公然亵渎。

sentences.en: The much discussed blasphemy against the Holy Spirit has its explanation here.
sentences.cn: 由此我们可以解释有关亵渎圣神的意思.

sentences.en: Their conversation was full of blasphemy.
sentences.cn: 他们的谈话中充满了渎犯神灵的言词.

sentences.en: You have just heard his blasphemy!
sentences.cn: 你刚刚听到他那番亵渎上帝的话了!

trans.tran_cn: 对上帝的亵渎，亵渎的言词[行为]，侮慢的言词（或行为）
trans.tran_en: something you say or do that is insulting to God or people’s religious beliefs
